page.title: 06GLADSTONE ROAD JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Gladstone Road is a Victorian School. It has a main hall and each side of the school is symmetrical.Three classrooms on the right hand side of the hall have been converted into a large dining room and a music room. Another classroom has been converted into the Headmaster's Office,the Secretary's office and a storeroom. The school has a modern curriculum but all the children must do certain subjects like Maths,Reading,English and Free Writing which are compulsory We have about 14 weeks holiday a year the longest is 6 weeks in the summer. We have a lot of after school activitives including Gym, Netball, Badminton and Cricket.The fourth years do AAA 5 Star awards which is a mixture of sports.In Summer we have educational visits.Each year group goes to a different place of interest.
